Detailed Description

Classe représentant une trackball simpliste.

Classe représentant une trackball simpliste pour une visualisation user-friendly de la scene 3D. Une trackball de cette classe s'attache a un boutton particulier de la souris. L'activation de la trackball se fait par quatre methodes qui doivent etre placees a des endroits precis :

  • displayBegin() : doit etre placee au debut du callback de dessin de la scene.
  • displayEnd() : doit etre placee a la fin du callback de dessin de la scene.
  • mouseGLUT(...) : doit etre place dans le callback en charge des evenements souris.
  • motionGLUT(...) : doit etre place dans le callback en charge des evenements de deplacement de la souris.
Warning:
THESE METHODS ARE BASED ON THE GL AND GLUT LIBRARIES.

IF YOU USE SOME OTHERS LIBRARIES FOR YOUR SOFTWARE, PLEASE WRITE YOUR OWN display/mouse/motion METHODS WITH THE GRAPHIC LIBRARY USED AND THE WINDOW MANAGEMENT LIBRARY NAMES IN SUFFIXE.

THEN LET US KNOW YOUR NEW METHOD.

EXAMPLE : displayBeginGL_GTK(), displayEndGL_GTK(), ... IF YOU ARE USING OPENGL AS YOUR GRAPHIC LIBRARY AND GTK AS YOUR WINDOW MANAGEMENT LIBRARY.

THANK YOU.

Cette trackball a vocation a etre amelioree/reecrite puisqu'elle ne suit pas exactement les attentes de l'utilisateur. Toutefois elle permet une manipulation simiple et rapide du point de vue de la scene 3D.

Todo:
Ameliorer la trackball pour la rendre plus intuitive (pour l'instant elle ne suis pas exactement les attentes de l'utilisateur mais a le merite d'exister).

Member Function Documentation

void TrackBall::displayBeginGL_GLUT (  ) 

Method that sets the OpenGL environement to display a 3D scene with a trackball vizualisation.

Method that sets the OpenGL environement to display a 3D scene with a trackball vizualisation.

Warning:
This method has to be placed at the first line (after the color buffer clearing) of the GLUT display callback func.
Returns:
(void)

void TrackBall::motionGL_GLUT ( int  _x,
int  _y 
)

Method managing the mouse motion GLUT events and sets the trackball parameters consequently.

Method managing the mouse motion GLUT events and sets the trackball parameters consequently.

Warning:
This method has to be placed in the GLUT mouse motion callback func.
Parameters:
_x : The position of the mouse cursor along the Ox window axe when the callback has been called.
_y : The position of the mouse cursor along the Oy window when the callback has been called.
Returns:
(void)

void TrackBall::mouseGL_GLUT ( int  _attachedButton,
int  _mouseButton,
int  _state,
int  _x,
int  _y 
)

Method managing the mouse GLUT events and sets the trackball parameters consequently.

Method managing the mouse GLUT events and sets the trackball parameters consequently.

Warning:
This method has to be placed in the GLUT mouse callback func.
Parameters:
_attachedButton : Button the user wants to attach the trackball activation. Can be set to : GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON, GLUT_MIDDLE_BUTTON or GLUT_RIGHT_BUTTON.
_mouseButton : The mouse button that called back the callback.
_x : The position of the mouse cursor along the Ox window axe when the callback has been called.
_y : The position of the mouse cursor along the Oy window when the callback has been called.
Returns:
(void)
